name: Vader's Bounty (V)
Lore: '''We would be honored if you would join us.''',
Text: 'Deploy on table. Slave I is destiny +2 when drawn for weapon or battle destiny. During battle: while non-[Reflections III] Boba Fett with Vader, neither may be excluded or lost until the damage segment, and may place this Effect in Lost Pile to make Boba Fett''s total weapon destiny +3.',
